definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

tiger bench (torture method in which the victim sits with legs extended horizontally along a bench, upper legs held down with straps while bricks are inserted under the feet, forcing the knee joint to bend in reverse)
in the country of the blind the one-eyed man is king
pinyin: shan1 zhong1 wu2 lao3 hu3 , hou2 zi5 cheng1 dai4 wang5
containing_words.word: 山中无老虎，猴子称大王

definition: "Tiger Vegetable Salad," Northeast China dish usually consisting of hot pepper, cucumber, cilantro and leek

sentences.english: The tiger paced up and down the cage.
Life is like a one-arm bandit…
When he said that, he was as fierce as a tiger.
sentences.chinese: 当他说话的时候，象一只老虎那样凶狠。

sentences.english: He saw a tiger couching itself by the tree.
sentences.chinese: 他看见一只老虎躺在树旁。

sentences.english: The expansion of agricultural land is destroying tigers’ habitats and food supply.
sentences.chinese: 农耕用地不断扩大，破坏了老虎的栖息地和食物来源。

sentences.english: She defeated the bad guy by virtue of her courage and by a pair of vices.
sentences.chinese: 由于她的勇气和借助一对老虎钳，她打败了那个坏蛋。

sentences.english: When Larkshimi tried to killed the chital, she has to avoid the sharp buckhorn which will be very dangerous to the tiger.
sentences.chinese: 当老虎试图咬死白斑鹿的时候，就要避开锋利的鹿角。

sentences.english: This elephant is five times weightier than that small tiger.
sentences.chinese: 这头大象比那只小老虎重五倍。

sentences.english: On the bag, you can see a little tiger, It's very lovely.
sentences.chinese: 在书包上面你可以看到一个小老虎，它很可爱。

sentences.english: Tiger went out to Istyle Town with me that day.
sentences.chinese: 那天老虎同学陪我再次去意街玩。

sentences.english: When the camera's flash went off, the tiger roared and disappeared, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说当他的相机闪光灯闪起时，老虎吼叫着消失了。

sentences.english: The South China Tiger (Panthera tigris amoyensis) is in grave danger of extinction.
sentences.chinese: 中国南方老虎于绝种的危殆。

sentences.english: The cat learned the physical skills quickly and the tiger was always behind.
sentences.chinese: 猫学习动作技巧涸旗，老虎却总是落后。

definition: Leo (star sign)/Shihtzu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
